name: Vampire Hunters
description:
Shoot, stack – and slay! Vampire Hunters is a rogue-lite retro FPS where the toughest Transylvanians stack guns to mow down monsters with extreme firepower. Collect new weapons, upgrade, and dominate as you explore new levels of this steampunk world.



The undead are about to learn the meaning of bullet hell.



  • Stack up new weapons to amass earth-shattering firepower.
  • Collect every firearm – from the classic revolver to a high-pressure holy water hose.
  • Upgrade, upgrade, upgrade!
  • Mix of old-school FPS with the innovative gameplay from Vampire Survivors.



  • Slay vampires, demons, and everything undead by the dozen.
  • Explore each unique steampunk environment of Transylvania.
  • Corridor-like gameplay - keep moving forward towards madness.



Become the baddest Vampire Hunter in Transylvania.
